  • 05-02-2020  //  Book summary: Peter Singer's Famine, Affluence and Morality

    This essay, written by Peter Singer in 1971 and published in Philosophy and Public Affairs in 1972, argues that you and I should probably give way more money to charity.
    I made this summary, which is perhaps better described as a paraphrase, as a way to remind myself of the contents of the original text. I encourage everyone to read the full essay!
